name: Cubitrix
description:
Welcome to Cubitrix, where your imagination becomes virtual reality.

Design your unique avatar

Personalize your avatar with our diverse clothes and hairstyles.

Create a room

Build and collaborate with other players online.

A variety of brick options

Our easy-to-navigate brick tablet menu offers a wide selection of shapes and sizes for building anything you can envision.

Whether you're constructing elaborate buildings or designing simple structures,
Cubitrix provides a fun and intuitive platform for all your creative endeavors.

Join our community and start building today!
